name: Riskrunner
description:
Gameplay

Riskrunner is a top-down starfighter game without the fighting. Players take control of a ship racing through an asteroid field towards a portal, frenetically dodging incoming debris using a unique feature that rotates the camera on an axis rather than moving left or right.

Plot

In the future, humanity has become a spacefaring civilisation, that employs daring pilots - known as Riskrunners - to chart dangerous and unexplored territories in space. The player is one such Riskrunner, racing through an asteroid field in an attempt to find portals to escape their predicament and get back to society with a thrilling tale of danger to tell.

Controls

Riskrunner uses Mouse and Keyboard inputs exclusively.

Movement [WASD]

Fire [SPACE]
